parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>False. There is no CMF number present in the provided post.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>False. The post does not refer to any specific parliamentary candidate or party.  It promotes a platform ("Eu cu cine votez?") designed to help voters understand their political values and find a matching party, but it doesn't endorse any particular candidate or party.</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>True. The post is a paid advertisement on Facebook, a public platform, and its message is clearly intended to reach a wide audience of Romanian voters.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>False. While the post relates to the parliamentary elections, its objective is not to directly influence voters to choose a specific candidate or party. Instead, it aims to encourage informed voting by providing a tool to help voters understand their political preferences.  The platform itself does not endorse any candidate.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>True. The post can be considered a form of public service announcement or citizen journalism, aiming to educate voters and promote informed participation in the electoral process. It provides a resource (the "Eu cu cine votez?" platform) to help voters make an informed decision.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>Not applicable. The post doesn't express a personal opinion; it presents a tool for voters.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>1582334029314026</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The Facebook post promotes a platform designed to help voters identify parties aligning with their values. It does not endorse specific candidates or parties, and its aim is to encourage informed voting rather than influencing votes for particular candidates.  The platform itself is neutral and does not advocate for any political party. While the timing coincides with the parliamentary elections, the content itself does not violate Article 98 t) because it doesn't constitute electoral propaganda as defined by Article 36 (7) of LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006.  The post fulfills the criteria of being educational and journalistic in nature, aiming to inform voters rather than sway their choices.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>FALSE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates/>
<responsible-party-or-group>DifinePR</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police/>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
